## ProductPriceFragment variable

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
ProductPriceFragment = "\n  fragment DefaultProductPrice on ProductPrice {\n    discounted {\n      value {\n        type\n        currencyCode\n        centAmount\n        fractionDigits\n      }\n      discount {\n        validFrom\n        validUntil\n        isActive\n        name(acceptLanguage: $acceptLanguage)\n      }\n    }\n    value {\n      type\n      currencyCode\n      centAmount\n      fractionDigits\n    }\n  }\n"
```
